short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure Ethereum wallet for personal use, giving users full control of their digital assets away from major exchanges.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Ethereum wallet that allows users to store their wallet information however they like. This is because secret phrase and private key are both shared with user and only once with wallet creation. You also can import any wallet as long as you know the secret phrase, as Greenchain Bank only allows users to interact with one wallet at a time for viewing balance and sending transactions.
